All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, net.sourceforge.jabm.event.EventListener, net.sourceforge.jabm.strategy.Strategy, net.sourceforge.jabm.util.Parameterizable, net.sourceforge.jabm.util.Prototypeable, net.sourceforge.jabm.util.Resetable, FixedQuantityStrategy, TradingStrategy, MarketEventListener
public class ZIPStrategy
extends MomentumStrategy
implements net.sourceforge.jabm.util.Prototypeable

An implementation of the Zero-Intelligence-Plus (ZIP) strategy. See:

"Minimal Intelligence Agents for Bargaining Behaviours in Market-based Environments" Dave Cliff 1997.

Version:
$Revision$
Author:
Steve Phelps
